entry.title: Bridge returned error 400! (18907)
entry.content:
Twitter @Sanctuary4AllCO was unable to receive or process the remote website's content!
Error message: `The requested resource cannot be found!
Please make sure your input parameters are correct!
cUrl error: (0)
PHP error: `
Query string: `action=display&bridge=Twitter&context=By+username&u=Sanctuary4AllCO&norep=on&nopic=on&noimg=on&format=Atom`
Version: `dev.2020-02-26`

  • Press Return to check your input parameters
  • Press F5 to retry
  • Check if this issue was already reported on GitHub (give it a thumbs-up)
  • Open a GitHub Issue if this error persists

pmaziere

Yessenia and her husband Carlos are selling smothered burritos and flan this weekend! If you’ve been looking for vegetarian green chile, don’t miss it. Order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.

entry.title: Today our friend Lupe will be having surgery. She will be having...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Today our friend Lupe will be having surgery. She will be having two delicate surgeries done at the same time, one to treat a hernia and the other to treat cancer in her kidney. She is an immigrant mother who has been working very hard to keep going. She does not have any medical insurance and she will have to pay the medical bills for the anesthesia. We’re asking for community to support her so we can take a little stress off her life. We are also asking for you to keep her in your thoughts and prayers today. Her family is so grateful for the community support. https://www.gofundme.com/f/help-lupe-pay-for-cancer-hernia-…

entry.title: Emergency call. Today, our friend Guadalupe Urquidez will be...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Emergency call. Today, our friend Guadalupe Urquidez will be entering surgery. She will be having 2 surgeries done at the same time that are very delicate, one hernia and cancer in a kidney. She is an immigrant mother that has been working very hard to keep going. She does not have any medical insurance and she will have to pay the medical bills. We ask the help of the community to help her so we could take off a little stress off her life. We are also asking for support that it all goes well, her family will be very grateful that the community will give this support.

Sanctuary4All Colorado

Please share an suport

For the last year, Lupe has been suffering from an abdominal hernia. It’s be… Sofia Halpin needs your support for Help Lupe Pay for Cancer & Hernia Treatment

gofundme.com

Help Lupe Pay for Cancer & Hernia Treatment, organized by Sofia Halpin

For the last year, Lupe has been suffering from an abdominal hernia. entry.title: 10 years ago, we were honoring the life of Alonzo Ashely. Today...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

10 years ago, we were honoring the life of Alonzo Ashely. Today we come back to the same place to keep honoring his life and supporting his family. It doesn’t matter how much time passes by, we will keep remembering the life of every person of color, black and brown, that has been killed in the hands of police. One day we will end with this practice of abuse, creating legislations to take away the protection of all those corrupt police officers that think that just because they have a badge, it gives them permission to kill our people. Marking the life of families, we will keep marching in the streets to end police brutality.
